title: Frequently Asked Questions
description: Everything you need to know about CoWorkingStay.

faqs.question: What is CoWorkingStay?
faqs.answer: CoWorkingStay is a network of premium coworking space hotels in the Philippines designed for remote workers and digital nomads.

faqs.question: is the internet reliable?
faqs.answer: Yes, we prioritize high-speed fiber internet at all our locations. Some locations also establish failover connections.

faqs.question: How do I book?
faqs.answer: You can request to book via our website form or join the waitlist for upcoming locations.
